inclusion.criterion: Thalassemia patients with serum ferritin ≥ 500 µg/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Voluntarily participate in the experiment, and the process of obtaining informed consent met the requirements of GCP.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hepatitis B surface antigen positive, hepatitis B core antibody positive and HBV-DNA positive
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood, but is currently asymptomatic. No liver or renal dysfunction noted.
